KnowledgeBase.Title: display
KnowledgeBase.ArgumentTypes: Character String Symbol Vector BitVector ByteVector IntVector Date FltVector ObjVector Structure Brick Dictionary Directory List Void Matrix NumMatrix Integer Float Number Complex Boolean Number Lambda

Function.Description: The display evaluates and displays the value of the expression {expr} followed by a newline character to the Analytic Information Server Analytic Information Server Console Window .

Brief.Overview: The display function evaluates and displays the value of the expression {expr} followed by a newline character to the Analytic Information Server Analytic Information Server Console Window . If no Console Window is open, Analytic Information Server Analytic Information Server will open a Console Window. The display Function always returns a value of true.
Brief.Usage: The display function is used to print a line to the Console Window. It behaves the same as the writeln function.

Argument.Name: expr
Argument.AISTypes: Character String Symbol Vector BitVector ByteVector IntVector Date FltVector ObjVector Structure Brick Dictionary Directory List Void Matrix NumMatrix Integer Float Number Complex Boolean Number Lambda

Syntax.Return: Returns the Boolean Value of true and evaluates the expression argument and prints the result to the Console window
